Judul: ANALYSIS OF C BLOCK AQCUISITION BY PT. X
Abstrak: Acquisition has been one popular corporate action that is done by upstream oil & gas companies to maintain its growth. It is favorable since even the price is usually more expensive than other way to maintain growth like exploration, it relatively has lower risks. However, in order to have successful acquisition, management of a company need to have strategy in the process so there will be value added when it success acquire the asset. This final project report hopefully can give pictures and ideas for the public who are interested in valuation and corporate action especially for those who are interested in upstream oil & gas sector.
